fileHeader.title: CAF File Header Record
fileHeader.description: File header information for a CAF Transaction.

agreements.title: CAF Transactions list
agreements.description: Allows a submitter to communicate a list of agreements transactions (CAF)

coreAgreement.title: Core Agreement
coreAgreement.description: The Core Agreement record contains information specific to the agreement and occurring at the agreement level.

terms.title: Agreement Term
terms.description: The Agreement Term (TRM) record contains information defining the territorial scope of the agreement and the duration and the start date in each territory.

territories.title: Territory Include / Exclude for Term
territories.description: The Territory Include / Exclude for Term (TIE) contains information defining the territories covered by a given TRM.

shares.title: Shares
shares.description: The Shares (SHR) record describes the shares of royalties (arising from licensing of rights) collectable by the Assignee, reserved to the Assignor and directly collectable by the creators.

territories.title: Territory Include / Exclude for Shares
territories.description: The Territory Include / Exclude for Shares (SIE) contains information defining the territories covered by a given SHR.

usageTypes.title: Usage Include / Exclude
usageTypes.description: The Usage Include / Exclude (UIE) record describes the usage types which are explicitly included in the Right Type in the associated SHR record and/or the usage types which are excluded from in the Right Type in the associated SHR record.

assignor.title: Assignor
assignor.description: The Assignor (ASR) record contains information identifying the party to the agreement which is passing collection rights to the Assignee (as identified in the ASE record).

assignee.title: Assignee
assignee.description: The Assignee (ASE) record contains information identifying the party to the agreement which is granted collection rights by the Assignor (as identified in the ASR record).

works.title: Work Details list
works.description: The list of Work Details (WRK) record which are subject to the agreement being described

items.title: Work Details
items.description: The Work Details (WRK) record contains details of works which are subject to the agreement being described, such details being sufficient to identify the works, but not details which specify work level collection shares, chain of copyright etc.. which are covered by the CWR format.

territories.title: Work Territory Include / Exclude list
territories.description: List of Work Territory Include / Exclude (WTR) record

items.title: Work Territory Include / Exclude
items.description: The Work Territory Include / Exclude (WTR) record contains information defining the territories covered by a given WRK record, if given.

recipientWorkNumbers.title: Recipient Work Number list
recipientWorkNumbers.description: The list of Recipient Work Number (RWN)

relatedAgreementNumbers.title: Related Agreements and Identifiers
relatedAgreementNumbers.description: The Related Agreements and Identifiers (XRF) record contains Recipient identifiers for the agreement and cross-references to related CAF transactions such as other elements of a co-publishing agreement and/or sub-publishing network or hub “agreement numbers”.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: The Termination (EXP) record contains information relating to the end of rights to collect for a right type and describes any retention or collection period which applies.

territories.description: The Territory Include / Exclude for Termination (TIX) contains information defining the territories covered by a given EXP record.
territories.title: Territory Include / Exclude for Termination

items.title: Territory Include / Exclude for Termination item

retainedWorks.title: Retained Works
retainedWorks.description: The Retained Works (RWK) record contains details of works which are subject to termination as described in an associated EXP record.  An RWK may further describe any exceptions to any default retention or collection period as set out in the EXP.

territories.title: Retained Work Territory Include / Exclude
territories.description: The Retained Work Territory Include / Exclude (RWT) record contains information defining the territories covered by a given RWK record respectively, if given.

recipientWorkNumbers.title: Recipient Work Number
recipientWorkNumbers.description: The Recipient Work Number (RWN) record contains Recipient identifiers for works listed in WRK or RWK records.

acknowledgements.title: Acknowledgment
acknowledgements.description: The purpose of a ACK transaction is to allow a Recipient to transmit back to the Submitter the processing status of individual CAF transaction into the Recipient’s systems.  In a CAF_ACK1 file this refers to the technical acceptance of the CAF transaction in terms of this specification, in a CAF_ACK2 file.

agreement.title: Acknowlegment CAF Header Record
agreement.description: Basic details of the agreement and recipient processing status.

relatedAgreementNumbers.title: Related Agreements and Identifiers
relatedAgreementNumbers.description: The Related Agreements and Identifiers (XRF) record contains Recipient identifiers for the agreement and cross-references to related CAF transactions such as other elements of a co-publishing agreement and/or sub-publishing network or hub “agreement numbers”.

file_header_record.title: Header Record
file_header_record.description: This is a required “cover sheet” for transmissions submitted by a participant. It will contain the file control information as well as the name of the submitter.

submitter_type.title: Submitter Type
submitter_type.description: Indicates if the nature of the Submitter of the file. Values are PB = Publisher, SO = Society, AA = Administrative Agency, WR = Writer, OO = Other

submitter_code.title: Submitter Code
submitter_code.description: If Submitter Type is equal to WR, the Submitter must enter their assigned CAF IPI Number in this field. If the Submitter Type is equal to PB, SO or AA the Submitter Codes assigned to that entity must be used.

submitter_name.title: Submitter Name
submitter_name.description: The name of the Submitter (publisher, society, agency or other entity)

creation_date_time.title: Creation Date with time
creation_date_time.description: The date and time that this file was created.

transmission_date.title: Transmission Date
transmission_date.description: The date that this file was transmitted to all receiving entities.

character_set.title: Character Set
character_set.description: To be used if this file contains data in a character set other than ASCII.

filename.title: Filename
filename.description: The full filename of the CAF file.

software_package.title: Software package
software_package.description: Name of the software package from which the file originated

caf_header_record.title: CAF Transaction
caf_header_record.description: Allows a submitter to communicate to a recipient (or multiple recipients) details of an agreement between two parties in relation to the right to collect income for a specified set of territories and rights.

transaction_type.title: Transaction Type
transaction_type.description: The type of CAF transaction. N = New / U = Update / T = Termination

submitter_agreement_number.title: Submitter Agreement Number
submitter_agreement_number.description: The Submitter’s unique identifier for the agreement or deal.

agreement_signature_date.title: Agreement Signature Date
agreement_signature_date.description: The date on which the parties signed the agreement (not necessarily the same as the Start Date in the TRM record).

status_code.title: Status Code
status_code.description: Used in ACK transactions to indicate the status of the processing of the submitted CAF transaction at the Recipient.

core_agreement.title: Core Agreement
core_agreement.description: The Core Agreement record contains information specific to the agreement and occurring at the agreement level.

type_of_agreement.title: Type Of Agreement
type_of_agreement.description: The type of agreement.  G = General / S = Specific

agreement_supplemental_information.title: The Aggreement_supplemental_information Schema
agreement_supplemental_information.description:
Information to assist with the interpretation of a specific agreement.
For example, a reference to an accompanying list of works, or to the definition of the specificity of the agreement.
If the agreement is a general agreement from a set date then the note "General from [Date]" may be provided here.

sales_or_manufacture.title: Sales Or Manufacture
sales_or_manufacture.description: Indicates if the Assignee has acquired rights either for products manufactured or for products sold in the territories of the agreement.  S= Sales / M = Manufacture

parties_on_contract.title: Parties On Contract
parties_on_contract.description: A text description of the parties to the agreement, such as would be found at the top of the paper contract.

non_roman_alphabet_parties_on_contract.title: Non Roman Alphabet Parties on Contract
non_roman_alphabet_parties_on_contract.description: A text description of the parties to the agreement, such as would be found at the top of the paper contract.

language_code.title: Language Code
language_code.description: The language of the Parties on Contract

script_code.title: Script Code
script_code.description: The code representing the script of Parties on Contract.

bulk_transfer_of_works.title: Bulk Transfer of Works
bulk_transfer_of_works.description: Indicates whether the Submitter is requesting that the Recipient perform a bulk transfer of works which are subject to the agreement from any previous agreements (if that agreement is fully expired in relation to the works) (Y = Yes) or that the Recipient await CWR work registrations for the works in question (N = No).

implied_or_obo.title: Implied/On-Behalf Of
implied_or_obo.description:
Indicates that CAF transaction represents an agreement which does not involve an Assignee controlled, owned or administered by the Submitter.
Used where the Recipient is informing the Submitter of creation of an implied agreement above that of the Submitter’s in the chain of copyright (I = Implied).
Also used whether the Submitter is informing the Recipient of the existence of an agreement above that of the Submitter’s in the chain of copyright (B = On Behalf Of).
If neither is true this field should have a value of N = Neither

writer_mechanical_reason_code.title: Writer Mechanicals Reason Code
writer_mechanical_reason_code.description: Code explaining why Assignee can collect over the society mandated maximum publisher mechanical share in the Territory.

usa_license_indicator.title: USA License Indicator
usa_license_indicator.description: Defines the US Society preference for licensing performing rights, via AMRA, ASCAP, BMI, GMR or SESAC.

gema_remuneration_claim_indicator.title: GEMA Remuneration Claim Indicator
gema_remuneration_claim_indicator.description:
If submitter marks Y this indicates that they have been authorised by the writer to receive publisher’s share for remuneration rights; and indemnifies GEMA if such claim is incorrect.
If submitter marks N they will not receive publisher’s share for remuneration rights

agreement_term.title: Agreement Term
agreement_term.description: The Agreement Term (TRM) record contains information defining the territorial scope of the agreement and the duration and the start date in each territory.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date on which the Assignee’s rights commence (as opposed to the Agreement Signature Date in the CAF Header Record which is the date on which the paperwork was signed).

prior_royalties.title: Prior Royalties
prior_royalties.description: A flag to indicate if the Assignee is allowed to collect royalties which were accrued before the start of the agreement but not yet paid out.

expected_termination.title: Expected Termination
expected_termination.description: Provides an indication of the expected termination of rights in the territory described in the accompanying T.  I = Indefinite - the termination cannot be defined at present.  L = LOC - the rights persist for the life of copyright. O = Other – a further explanation will be given in the Expected Termination Text field.

expected_termination_text.title: Expected Termination Text
expected_termination_text.description: A text description of the terms on which the rights will be terminated in the territory described.
expected_termination_text.examples: Rights terminated in Russia from the 2nd of June, 2020.

post_term_retention_period.title: Post Term Retention Period
post_term_retention_period.description: Indicates whether or not the Submitter anticipates that the Assignee will retain rights to license and collect income beyond the expiry of the term of the agreement.

post_term_collection_period.title: Post Term Collection Period
post_term_collection_period.description: Indicates whether or not the Submitter anticipates that the Assignee will retain rights to collect income generated during the term or retention beyond the expiry of the term or any retention period.

assignor.title: Assignor
assignor.description: The Assignor (ASR) record contains information identifying the party to the agreement which is passing collection rights to the Assignee (as identified in the ASE record).

person.title: Person
person.description: Y/N indicates whether the Assignor is a person or an entity (such as a publishing company).

name.title: Assignor Name
name.description: Last name or surname (if a person) or name of entity (if a company or other entity).

given_name.title: Assignor Given Name(s)
given_name.description: Given name(s) of the Assignor in "natural" order

nra_given_name.title: Non Roman Alphabet Assignor Given Name(s)
nra_given_name.description: Given name(s) of the Assignor in "natural" order

pro_affiliation.title: Assignor PRO Affiliation
pro_affiliation.description: Primary performance rights society affiliation of the Assignor.

ipi_name_number.title: Assignor IPI Name Number
ipi_name_number.description: An IPI number identifying the Assignor

name_nra_script_code.title: Assignor Name NRA Script Code
name_nra_script_code.description: The code representing the script of this name if given in a Non-Roman Alphabet.

assignee.title: Assignee
assignee.description: The Assignee (ASE) record contains information identifying the party to the agreement which is granted collection rights by the Assignor (as identified in the ASR record).

pro_affiliation.title: Assignee PRO Affiliation
pro_affiliation.description: Primary performance rights society affiliation of the Assignee.

ipi_name_number.title: Assignee IPI Name Number
ipi_name_number.description: An IPI number identifying the Assignee

company_grouping_code.title: Company Grouping
company_grouping_code.description: Submitter’s internal grouping code to which the Assignee belongs.

name_nra_script_code.title: Assignee Name NRA Script Code
name_nra_script_code.description: The code representing the script of this name if given in a Non-Roman Alphabet.

shares.title: Shares
shares.description: The Shares (SHR) record describes the shares of royalties (arising from licensing of rights) collectable by the Assignee, reserved to the Assignor and directly collectable by the creators.

right_type.title: Right Type
right_type.description: The type of right to which the collectable shares given apply.

creator_share_retained.title: Creator Share Retained
creator_share_retained.description: Defines the proportion of the total collectable shares of a work subject to this agreement which will be collected directly by the creators of the work.

publisher_share_retained.title: Publisher Share Retained
publisher_share_retained.description: Defines the proportion of the total collectable shares of a work subject to this agreement which the Assignor is reserving to itself either for itself to collect or for another publisher to collect.

assignee_collectable_share.title: Assignee Collectable Share
assignee_collectable_share.description: Defines the proportion of the total collectable shares of a work subject to this agreement which will be collected by the Assignee.

territory_inclusion_exclusion.title: Territory Include / Exclude for Term
territory_inclusion_exclusion.description: The Territory Include / Exclude for Term, Share and Termination. Contains information defining the territories covered by a given Term, Share and Termination.

work_territory_inclusion_exclusion.title: Work Territory Include / Exclude
work_territory_inclusion_exclusion.description: The Work Territory Include / Exclude (WTR) record contains information defining the territories covered by a given WRK record, if given.

usage_include_exclude.title: Usage Include / Exclude
usage_include_exclude.description: The Usage Include / Exclude (UIE) record describes the usage types which are explicitly included in the Right Type in the associated SHR record and/or the usage types which are excluded from in the Right Type in the associated SHR record.

include_exclude.title: Include / Exclude
include_exclude.description: A flag to indicate if the Usage Type is included or excluded from the territories. (I) Include / (E) Exclude.

usage_type.title: Usage Type
usage_type.description: The type of usage to which the Include / Exclude applies.

library_music.title: Library Music
library_music.description: Y / N indicates whether or not the music in this deal is exclusively library or production music.

recording_prefix.title: Recording Prefix
recording_prefix.description: Primary catalog number prefix for those recordings which form part of the production music library in question.

related_agreements_identifiers.title: Related Agreements and Identifiers
related_agreements_identifiers.description: The Related Agreements and Identifiers (XRF) record contains Recipient identifiers for the agreement and cross-references to related CAF transactions such as other elements of a co-publishing agreement and/or sub-publishing network or hub “agreement numbers”.

transmitter_code.title: Transmitter Code
transmitter_code.description: Number assigned to the Recipient whose code can be found in the Transmitter Identifier field.

transmitter_agreement_id.title: Transmitter Agreement Identifier
transmitter_agreement_id.description: An identifier that relates to this agreement which was issued by the Recipient or Submitter identified in Transmitter Code.

related_agreement_type.title: Related Agreement Type
related_agreement_type.description: If the Transmitter Identifier relates to another agreement, either as a (C) co-publishing agreement or an (R) existing sub-publishing network or hub already registered at the Recipient.

work_details.title: Work Details
work_details.description: The Work Details (WRK) record contains details of works which are subject to the agreement being described, such details being sufficient to identify the works, but not details which specify work level collection shares, chain of copyright etc.. which are covered by the CWR format.

nra_work_title.title: Non Roman Alphabet Work Title
nra_work_title.description: Primary title of the work expressed in non roman alphabet characters.

nra_work_title_script_code.title: Work Title NRA Script Code
nra_work_title_script_code.description: The code representing the script of the Non-Roman Alphabet Work Title if given.

creators.title: Work Creators
creators.description:
The creators of the work. In the format:
Last Name, Given Name / Last Name, Given Name / etc...
or
Last Name / Last Name / Last Name etc...

nra_creators.title: Non Roman Alphabet Work Creators
nra_creators.description:
The creators of the work. In the format:
Last Name, Given Name / Last Name, Given Name / etc...
or
Last Name / Last Name / Last Name etc...

nra_creators_script_code.title: Work Creators NRA Script Code
nra_creators_script_code.description: The code representing the script of the Non-Roman Alphabet Work Creators if given.

submitter_work_number.title: Submitter Work Number
submitter_work_number.description: Number assigned to the work by the Submitter. This number must be unique for the Submitter.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: The Termination (EXP) record contains information relating to the end of rights to collect for a right type and describes any retention or collection period which applies.

termination_date.title: Termination Date
termination_date.description: The date from which the EXP details are effective.

request_terminated_works_list.title: Request Terminated Works List
request_terminated_works_list.description: Does the Submitter request that the Recipient provide a list of works which have been amended to reflect the EXP.  Such a list could be provided using the returned CAF_ACK2 file.

works_retained.title: Works Retained
works_retained.description: Indicates which, if any, of the works associated with the agreement are subject to a retention period.

default_retained_until.title: Default Retained Until
default_retained_until.description: If a work is retained, the default period for which the work is retained by the Assignee (the period from which any work level exceptions will vary).

default_retained_until_date.title: Default Retained Until Date
default_retained_until_date.description: If Default Retained Until = D, then the date on which the retention period ends.

default_collection_until.title: Default Collection Until
default_collection_until.description: If a work is subject to a collection period, the default period for which the income earned in the term or retention may be collected by the Assignee (the period from which any work level exceptions will vary).

default_collection_until_date.title: Default Collection Until Date
default_collection_until_date.description: If Default Collection Until = D, then the date on which the collection period ends.

retained_works_detail.title: Retained Works
retained_works_detail.description: The Retained Works (RWK) record contains details of works which are subject to termination as described in an associated EXP record.  An RWK may further describe any exceptions to any default retention or collection period as set out in the EXP.

nra_work_title.title: Non Roman Alphabet Work Title
nra_work_title.description: Primary title of the work expressed in non roman alphabet characters.

nra_work_title_script_code.title: Work Title NRA Script Code
nra_work_title_script_code.description: The code representing the script of the Non-Roman Alphabet Work Title if given.

submitter_work_number.title: Submitter Work Number
submitter_work_number.description: Number assigned to the work by the Submitter. This number must be unique for the Submitter.

use_default_retention.title: Use Default Retention
use_default_retention.description:
(D)  - Use the default collection period described in the EXP
(S) – Use the retention period described in this RWK

work_retained_until.title: Work Retained Until
work_retained_until.description: If a work is retained, the default period for which the work is retained by the Assignee (the period from which any work level exceptions will vary).

work_retained_until_date.title: Work Retained Until Date
work_retained_until_date.description: If Default Retained Until = D, then the date on which the retention period ends

work_collection_until.title: Work Collection Until
work_collection_until.description: If a work is subject to a collection period, the default period for which the income earned in the term or retention may be collected by the Assignee (the period from which any work level exceptions will vary).

work_collection_until_date.title: Work Collection Until Date
work_collection_until_date.description: If Default Collection Until = D, then the date on which the collection period ends.

recipient_work_number.title: Recipient Work Number
recipient_work_number.description: The Recipient Work Number (RWN) record contains Recipient identifiers for works listed in WRK or RWK records.

code.title: Recipient Code
code.description: Tansmitter code assigned to Recipient which generated the Recipient Identifier.

identifier.title: Recipient Identifier
identifier.description: An identifier that relates to this work which was issued by the Recipient identified in Recipient Code.

message.title: Message
message.description: List all messages generated as a result of editing this transaction.

message_text.title: The message_text Schema
message_text.examples: Only one AGR Core Agreement record is allowed per CAF Transaction

tisn.title: TIS Numeric Code
tisn.description: Territory to which the Include / Exclude applies.  Values can be found in the TIS Code Table.

include_exclude.title: Include / Exclude
include_exclude.description: A flag to indicate if the TIS Numeric Code is included or excluded from the territories. (I) Include / (E) Exclude.

exclusion_until.title: Exclusion Until
exclusion_until.description:
If the work is (E) Excluded the length of the exclusion.
(D) Date - Until a date as specified in Exclusion Until Date
(N) Until Further Notice – Until the Submitter notifies otherwise
(L) Life of Copyright – The work will never form part of the agreement

exclusion_until_date.title: Exclusion Until Date
exclusion_until_date.description: If the work is (E) Excluded and the Excluded Until = D, then the date until which the work is excluded.
